00009 #ifndef GLOBJECT_H
00010 #define GLOBJECT_H
00011 
00012 #include <GL/gl.h>
00013 #include <cstdarg>
00014 
00015 #include <vector>
00016 
00017 #include "Log.H"
00018 
00025 class GLObject {
00026     public:
00027         GLObject (GLuint objlist = 0): List () {
00028             if (glIsList (objlist)) List.push_back (objlist);
00029         }
00030 
00031         GLObject (unsigned elements, GLuint objlist, ...): List () {
00032             SingletonLog::Instance() << "    GLObject (" << (long)elements << ", ";
00033             if (glIsList (objlist)) {
00034                 SingletonLog::Instance() << (long)objlist << ", ";
00035                 List.push_back (objlist);
00036             } else {
00037                 SingletonLog::Instance() << (long)objlist << " not a GL list ";
00038             }
00039 
00040             va_list argp;
00041             va_start (argp, objlist);
00042 
00043             for (unsigned i = 1; i < elements; i++) {
00044                 objlist = va_arg (argp, GLuint);
00045 
00046                 if (glIsList (objlist)) {
00047                     SingletonLog::Instance() << (long)objlist << ", ";
00048                     List.push_back (objlist);
00049                 }
00050 
00051                 else SingletonLog::Instance() << (long)objlist << " not a GL list ";
00052             }
00053 
00054             SingletonLog::Instance() << ")\n";
00055 
00056             va_end (argp);
00057         }
00058 
00059 
00060         virtual ~GLObject (void) {
00061             for (unsigned i = 0; i < List.size (); i++)
00062                 if (glIsList (List[i])) glDeleteLists (List[i], 1);
00063         }
00064 
00065         virtual unsigned Draw (void) {
00066             SingletonLog::Instance() << "GLObject::Draw (";
00067 
00068             for (unsigned i = 0; i < List.size (); i++) {
00069                 SingletonLog::Instance() << (long)List[i] << ", ";
00070                 glCallList (List[i]);
00071             }
00072             SingletonLog::Instance() << ")\n";
00073 
00074             return 0;
00075         }
00076 
00077         operator bool () {
00078             if (List.empty ()) return false;
00079             for (unsigned i = 0; i < List.size (); i++)
00080                 if (glIsList (List[i])) return true;
00081             return false;
00082         }
00083 
00084         protected:
00085             std::vector<GLuint> List;
00086 };
00087 #endif
